articles.author: Benjamin Brown and Jorge Engels
articles.title: Alleged Russian spy attempted to infiltrate the International Criminal Court as an intern, say Dutch authorities
articles.description: Dutch authorities say they have thwarted an attempt by a Russian spy to gain access to the International Criminal Court (ICC) by posing as an intern.
articles.content: Dutch authorities say they have thwarted an attempt by a Russian spy to gain access to the International Criminal Court (ICC) by posing as an intern.

articles.title: Michael Avenatti pleads guilty to stealing millions of dollars from clients

articles.title: Final Parent in College-Admissions Cheating Case Found Not Guilty

articles.title: New satellite imagery shows flooding in Yellowstone altered the river's course
